title: Designing Digital-Based Flexible Learning Pathways: Strengthening Self-Regulated Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Tool Competency and Basic Grasp of Social Studies Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: Corporate-commissioned training course for in-service elementary teachers to enhance social studies lesson design competencies. Implements personalized learning activities using personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways by applying self-regulated learning strategies on digital platforms.
Learners can select and combine subject-specific learning modules (history, culture, environment, etc.) in social studies classes to develop optimal teaching-learning scenarios.
Learners enhance their self-regulated learning competencies by revising and supplementing their learning plans based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
